SEARCH
Package gutek.entities.cards

Class CardBase

java.lang.Object
gutek.entities.cards.CardBase
Direct Known Subclasses:
CardConstantCoefficient, CardSuperMemo2
@Entity public class CardBase extends Object
Represents the base class for a card in a revision system. This class defines common fields and methods for different types of cards, including fields for storing the front and back of the card, revision dates, and the deck to which the card belongs.

  • Constructor Details

    • CardBase

      public CardBase(String front, String back, DeckBase deck)
      Constructs a new card with the given front, back, and associated deck. This constructor initializes the card with the current date as the next regular and reverse revision dates, and sets the creation time to the current time. The card is also marked as new.
      Parameters:
      front - the front content of the card
      back - the back content of the card
      deck - the deck to which the card belongs
